bootstrap.title: Bootstrap
bootstrap.description: Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JS framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

foundation.title: Foundation
foundation.description: The most advanced responsive front-end framework in the world.

jquery.title: jQuery
jquery.description: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library.

protractor.title: Protractor
protractor.description: End to end test framework for AngularJS applications built on top of WebDriverJS.

coffee.title: CoffeeScript
coffee.description: CoffeeScript is a little language that compiles into JavaScript.

jade.title: Jade
jade.description: Jade is a terse and simple templating language with a strong focus on performance and powerful features.

ruby-sass.title: Sass (Ruby)
ruby-sass.description: Original Syntactically Awesome StyleSheets implemented in Ruby

node-sass.title: Sass (Node)
node-sass.description: Node.js binding to libsass, the C version of the popular stylesheet preprocessor, Sass.

less.title: Less
less.description: Less extends the CSS language, adding features that allow variables, mixins, functions and many other techniques.

stylus.title: Stylus
stylus.description: Stylus is a revolutionary new language, providing an efficient, dynamic, and expressive way to generate CSS. Supporting both an indented syntax and regular CSS style.
